a:r.a:t: Evaluation Arms: Decomposing the CoT Representation Gap
Sec 3.1: NL vs Code thought (same LLM executor)
Sec 3.2: LLM vs External executor (same code thought)
Arm 1 to 3 is hard to analyze directly. We decompose into smaller jumps: Arm 1 to 2 (Sec 3.1) + Arm 2.5 to 3 (Sec 3.2). Arms 2.5 and 3 share the same context (code only, no prompt).
